text: Gerardo Dúran (born October 31, 2003), is an American soccer player who plays as a midfielder for Portland Timbers 2 via the Portland Timbers academy. ==Club career== After playing with the Portland Timbers academy, Dúran appeared as an 62nd-minute substitute for Portland's USL Championship side Portland Timbers 2 on August 31, 2019 in a 3-1 win over Reno 1868. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:American soccer players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:Soccer players from Oregon Category:USL Championship players Category:Sportspeople from Hillsboro, Oregon
title: Gerardo Dúran
